data.message: Through the tears and the fighting all the nights driving do you ever think of us this world was made for us.the million hearts breaking cause of the love were making do you think they only hear us.this world was made for us.through the screaming and the teasing coulnt help but him leaving is this world made for us.is this love made for us this world was made for us....just thought it hope you got it.from me to you baby brown to blue eyes true in love with you moe the you thought you know my imspiration.to my pimadore from you your shady lady .
